children.name: TermsOptInDescription
children.value:
**I agree to the Sweepstakes terms and Conditions. By entering the Sweepstakes, you authorize CITGO to deliver or cause to be delivered to your cell phone number telemarketing calls and text messages using an automatic telephone dialing system. You are not required to consent to receive such calls or text messages as a condition of making any purchase.**

Your tapping the button below constitutes your electronic signature on, and manifests your assent to the (#c #F58220)(**)[Club CITGO Terms and Conditions](https://www.citgoprivacy.com/ClubCITGO/)(**)(#c) and the (#c #F58220)(**)[CITGO Privacy Policy](https://www.citgoprivacy.com/)(**)(#c). You further agree that you are the primary owner of the phone number(s) associated with this Club CITGO account, and that any such phone numbers are incorporated by reference into the Sweepstakes Terms and Conditions, the Club CITGO Terms and Conditions, and the CITGO Privacy Policy. You may unsubscribe at any time by changing your notification preferences in the settings section of the Club CITGO app.

**Message and Data Rates May Apply.**

children.value: Always save 6/gal with Premier Status at CITGO

actions.value: Premier rewards only available in IN, NY, NC & WI. You're saving 6/gal on every fill-up with Premier Status at CITGO. Fill up 12 times every quarterly period to keep your Premier Status.
You're saving 3/gal on every fill-up with Club Status at CITGO. Fill up 12 times every quarterly period to earn Premier Status. Premier rewards only available in IN, NY, NC & WI.

No Club or Premier status found.
If this problem persists, please contact Customer Support.

children.name: Disclaimer
children.value:
Your available rewards at the pump 
may vary by location.

children.name: Body1
children.value: Thank you for your loyalty! You will save at least 6/gal at participating CITGO stations. Premier rewards only available in IN, NY, NC & WI.

staticParameters.tierBulletText: Everyday reward of 6/gal, up to 30 gallons, at participating CITGO stations.
Ability to stack Premier everyday reward with other available rewards to save more.
Amplified savings for Triple Tuesday: 18/gal one time a month.
You must fill up 12 times (minimum 8 gallons) during each quarterly period to maintain Premier Status.
Members who do not qualify for Premier Status will receive Club Status.
Members with Club Status earn an everyday reward of 3/gal at participating CITGO stations.

children.name: DisclaimerText
children.value: Restrictions apply. Limit 30 gallons, per purchase at participating CITGO stations.

children.name: Body1
children.value: Thanks for being a Club CITGO member. Each qualifying purchase puts you one step closer to Premier Status. As Club Status Member you will receive:

staticParameters.tierBulletText: Everyday reward of 3/gal, up to 30 gallons, at participating CITGO stations.
Ability to stack everyday reward with other available rewards to save more.
Access to monthly promotions like Triple Tuesday and 5 Friday.
Premier rewards only available in IN, NY, NC & WI.
Complete 12 qualifying fill-ups of at least 8 gallons within a quarterly period to reach Premier status and receive everyday reward of 6/gal.
You will keep your Premier Status for the remainder of your qualification period and for the following 3-month period.
In order to maintain Premier Status level, you must continue to make 12 qualifying fill-ups of at least 8 gallons during each quarterly period.
Visit the Club CITGO website to learn more about the quarterly periods.

children.name: DisclaimerText
children.value: Restrictions apply. Limit 30 gallons, per purchase at participating CITGO stations.

children.name: Body1
children.value: You're saving at least 10c/gal at Shell and earning 2X In-Store Rewards on select convenience store items.

staticParameters.tierBulletText: Your 10/gal stacks with additional Fuel Rewards Savings earned from everyday purchases, such as In-Store Rewards, dining, online shopping, and partner offers.
Earn 2X In-Store Rewards on select convenience store items.
Gain access to special rewards and VIP Experiences.
You must fill up 12 times with 10+ gallons in your 3-month qualification quarter to maintain Platinum Status.

children.name: DisclaimerText
children.value: Restrictions apply. Limit 20 gallons, per purchase, per vehicle at participating Shell stations.

children.name: Body1
children.value: You're saving at least 5/gal at Shell.

staticParameters.tierBulletText: Your 5/gal stacks with additional Fuel Rewards Savings earned from everyday purchases, such as In-Store Rewards, dining, online shopping, and partner offers.
Advance to Platinum Status by filling up 12 times with 10+ gallons in your 3-month qualification quarter to earn at least 10/gal on every fill-up.
You will keep your Platinum Status for the remainder of your qualification quarter, as well as the next benefit quarter.

children.name: DisclaimerText
children.value: Restrictions apply. Limit 20 gallons, per purchase, per vehicle at participating Shell stations.

children.name: Body1
children.value: You're saving at least 3/gal at Shell.

staticParameters.tierBulletText: Your 3/gal stacks with additional Fuel Rewards Savings earned from everyday purchases, such as In-Store Rewards, dining, online shopping, and partner offers.
Advance to Gold Status by filling up 6 times with 10+ gallons in your 3-month qualification quarter to earn at least 5/gal on every fill-up.
You will keep your Gold Status for the remainder of your qualification period, as well as the next benefit quarter.

actions.value: You have Complimentary (#c #A58F62)Gold Status(#c) through |~ MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.complimentaryUntil FORMAT_DATESHORT ~|.
You have Complimentary (#c #A6A9AA)Platinum Status(#c) through |~ MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.complimentaryUntil FORMAT_DATESHORT ~|.
Thanks for being our most loyal member. You'll keep Platinum until |~ MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.PLATINUM.endDate FORMAT_DATESHORT ~|.

Fill up |~ MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.PLATINUM.requirement - MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.PLATINUM.purchaseBalance ~| more times by |~ MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.PLATINUM.evalEndDate FORMAT_DATESHORT ~| to maintain Platinum Status.
You'll keep your Platinum Status during the Complimentary Period. To help you maintain Platinum, we will start tracking qualifying fill-ups 3 months before your Complimentary Status expires.

Fill up |~ MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.PLATINUM.requirement - MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.PLATINUM.purchaseBalance ~| more times by |~ MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.PLATINUM.evalEndDate FORMAT_DATESHORT ~| to advance to Platinum Status with 10/gal savings.

To maintain your 5/gal savings, complete 6 fill-ups by the end of your 3-month qualification quarter.

Save more by advancing to Platinum Status! Fill up |~ MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.PLATINUM.requirement - MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.PLATINUM.purchaseBalance ~| more times by |~ MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.PLATINUM.evalEndDate FORMAT_DATESHORT ~|.

You'll keep your Gold Status during the Complimentary Period. To help you maintain Gold, we will start tracking qualifying fill-ups 3 months before your Complimentary Status expires.

Fill up |~ MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.GOLD.requirement - MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.GOLD.purchaseBalance ~| more times by |~ MemberAttributesData.derivedData.tiers.12805.GOLD.evalEndDate FORMAT_DATESHORT ~| to advance to Gold Status with 5/gal savings.

children.name: DetailsContent
children.value: The Club CITGO Gas for a Year Sweepstakes is your chance to win fuel for a year from CITGO. One lucky winner will be chosen. Register for the Sweepstakes in the Club CITGO app, and then CHECK IN on the app daily at your local participating CITGO locations to earn additional entries. Check back quarterly for new sweepstakes.

staticParameters.tierBulletText: Get started by tapping the Enter Sweeps button below.
Then Check In daily for more chances to win!

NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. A PURCHASE WILL NOT INCREASE YOUR CHANCES OF WINNING. VOID WHERE PROHIBITED. Sweepstakes ends December 10, 2024. For entry and official rules with complete eligibility, prize descriptions, odds disclosure and other details, visit (#c #F58220)(**)[Official Rules](https://www.citgo.com/club-citgo-sweepstakes-rules?utm_source=club-citgo-app&utm_medium=link&utm_id=sweepstakes-rules)(**)(#c). Sponsor: CITGO Petroleum Corporation, 1293 Eldridge Pkwy., Houston, TX 77077. Apple and Google are not sponsors of this sweepstakes or involved in any manner.

children.name: OfferDescription
children.value: Save 3 per gallon. Up to 30 gallons.

children.name: TermsAndConditionsText
children.value:
More Info:
Club CITGO members can enjoy a 3 per gallon Reward on fuel (for up to 30 gallons) when you use your Alt ID at participating locations. See below for details.

children.name: TermsAndConditionsText2
children.value:
Terms and Conditions:
If paying at the pump, you must enter your Alt ID before paying to receive the Reward. If paying inside, you must enter your Alt ID or ask the cashier to scan your Mobile ID prior to paying to receive the Reward. This Reward is issued for promotional purposes only and limited to Club CITGO members. The Reward is limited to a one-time fill of up to 30 gallons. The Reward applies only at the time of purchase and cannot be accrued. Individual Reward conditions apply. Consumer pays sales tax, if applicable. This Reward may not be bought, reproduced, transferred, or sold. There is no cash back offered as part of the Reward. This Reward is void where taxed, restricted, or prohibited. This promotion is not available in New Jersey. The Reward is only available at participating CITGO locations, while supplies and this promotion lasts. This promotion may be terminated anytime in CITGO's sole discretion. Other limitations may apply. For full Club CITGO Terms and Conditions, please see links below.

children.name: OfferDescription

One Tuesday a month, Club CITGO members can enjoy an additional 6 per gallon Reward on fuel (for up to 30 gallons) for a total of 9 per gallon Reward when you use your loyalty ID at participating locations. This Reward is limited to one use per member per month. See below for details.

The Reward applies only at the time of purchase and cannot be accrued. Individual Reward conditions apply. Consumer pays sales tax, if applicable. This Reward may not be bought, reproduced, transferred, or sold. There is no cash back offered as part of the Reward. This Reward Is void where taxed, restricted, or prohibited. This promotion is not available in New Jersey. This Reward is only available at participating CITGO locations, while supplies and this promotion lasts. This promotion may be terminated anytime in CITGO's sole discretion. Other limitations may apply. For full Club CITGO Terms and Conditions, please see links below.
